alert.note: Alert for Linn (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 10:00PM CDT until July 12 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Linn County in east central Kansas... Southern Bates County in west central Missouri... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 959 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pleasanton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Butler, Rich Hill, Pleasanton, Mound City, Hume, Prescott, Amoret, Rockville, Foster and Worland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
